original_text: Restore, I pray you, to them, even this day, their lands, their vineyards, their oliveyards, and their houses, also the hundredth part of the money, and of the corn, the wine, and the oil, that ye exact of them.
korean_text: 그런즉 너희는 그들에게 오늘이라도 그들의 밭과 포도원과 감람원과 집이며 너희가 꾸어 준 돈이나 양식이나 새 포도주나 기름의 백분의 일을 돌려보내라 하였더니

sentences.original_text: Restore, I pray you, to them, even this day
their lands, their vineyards, their oliveyards, and their houses
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 토지, 포도원, 감람원, 그리고 집들을

sentences.original_text: also the hundredth part of the money
and of the corn, the wine, and the oil
